channel.title: Bars on Gourmand Syndrome
channel.description: Recent content in Bars on Gourmand Syndrome

item.title: Curio
item.description: Curio is a local bar restaurant around where we were staying. My partner wanted to meet their friends locally here since it was new to them, and in the evenings, it appeared to be a very happening place. We were able to walk in for 4 people at around 6 PM without any issues. We had the option of sitting right in the outdoor area in front of the restaurant with security guards around, but we opted to sit inside toward the back.
